entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
